name: R5_v2_0257_for_R4B
title: Cross-version VS for R5.Hl7VSNatureOfChallenge for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version ValueSet represents concepts from http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v2-0257|2.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B. Concepts not present here have direct `equivalent` mappings crossing all versions from R5 to R4B.

concept.display: Fasting (no calorie intake) for the period specified in the time component of the term, e.g., 1H POST CFST
Exercise undertaken as challenge (can be quantified)
No fluid intake for the period specified in the time component of the term

contains.display: Fasting (no calorie intake) for the period specified in the time component of the term, e.g., 1H POST CFST
Exercise undertaken as challenge (can be quantified)
No fluid intake for the period specified in the time component of the term
